local_intent: Perceive t_block, approach and align, establish contact, then execute a timed push of 0.2 toward 180 deg, retreat, and hold
assumptions: t_block is in workspace or can be found by raster scan
Yaw 0 aligns tool for the desired push direction 180
Contact is achieved within the allowed lowering depth before push
coherence_with_global: Mirrors global sequence: visibility fallback with scan, precise approach and yaw set, controlled lowering to contact, timeout-wrapped push with given params, then retreat and wait
